findings.title: Burn rights given to onlyOwner
findings.description: The burn rights are provided to onlyOwner which signifies that the owner can burn any user token.
findings.location: AQEX Token smart contract, onlyOwner function

findings.title: Setter for _rem_supply is missing
findings.description: If the owner wants to increase the _rem_supply in future then as per current implementation owner canâ€™t do that.

findings.title: Variable visibility not defined
findings.description: The visibility of _rem_supply has not been defined.

findings.title: Used locked pragma version
findings.description: The pragma versions used in the contract are not locked.
findings.location: AQEX Token smart contract, pragma solidity statement

findings.title: Missing comments and description
findings.description: Comments and Description of the methods and the variables are missing.
findings.location: AQEX Token smart contract, various functions and variables

findings.title: Public methods only being used externally
findings.description: 'public' functions that are never used within the contract should be declared 'external' to save gas.
findings.location: AQEX Token smart contract, public methods

findings.title: _mint name should changed to mint
findings.description: Mostly _mint is used for internal methods, not for external/public.
